properties.displayName: Suspicious Cabinet File Execution Via Msdt.EXE
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains " -cab " or ProcessCommandLine contains " /cab ") and (FolderPath endswith "\\msdt.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "msdt.exe")

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects execution of msdt.exe using the "cab" flag which could indicates suspicious diagcab files with embedded answer files leveraging CVE-2022-30
